channel.title: A video that will change your life
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eZ9GF5cM5tQ
please before you comment or anything,i want you to watch it till the end,before you decide.

item.title: A video that will change your life
item.dc:creator: @Revamp_dis_Shit Revamp dis Shit
item.description:
@Revamp_dis_Shit wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:21, topic:525147”]I understand the Muslim religion and how they trust one another, i do. However, i cannot agree with the fact that you said it would change the life of those who watch it. We come from different background and understand different values, it would be ignorant to say this will effect us all the same. Those who follow religions such as Christianity or no religion at all do not have the same faith or trust in those of the same religion as those who are Muslim do.

A lot of people know what is happening in your country, a lot of people know about the war that still goes on and the problems you face. That does not mean, however, that we feel the same way about it as you do. Patriotism effects each of us differently, and we feel more strongly toward our own country then others which is why those who have watched this video will not be moved. It is a tale of a boy who was saved because of trust, to them that is all it was although to you it was so much more.[/quote]

Amy, I’m sorry to say but this has as much meaning and importance to every race of people as it does to the Muslim faith.

Read full topic
item.source: A video that will change your life

item.title: A video that will change your life
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

I understand the Muslim religion and how they trust one another, i do. However, i cannot agree with the fact that you said it would change the life of those who watch it. We come from different background and understand different values, it would be ignorant to say this will effect us all the same. Those who follow religions such as Christianity or no religion at all do not have the same faith or trust in those of the same religion as those who are Muslim do.

A lot of people know what is happening in your country, a lot of people know about the war that still goes on and the problems you face. That does not mean, however, that we feel the same way about it as you do. Patriotism effects each of us differently, and we feel more strongly toward our own country then others which is why those who have watched this video will not be moved. It is a tale of a boy who was saved because of trust, to them that is all it was although to you it was so much more.

item.title: A video that will change your life
item.dc:creator: @Revamp_dis_Shit Revamp dis Shit
item.description:
@Revamp_dis_Shit wrote:

The concept of this video has been done so many times before…just changed and tweaked to fit different cultural backgrounds.
If this is the first time you’ve heard this or a story with great similarities then where was your childhood?

This is a story in which is told to children to teach them about trust, risk, and etc.

Read full topic

item.title: A video that will change your life
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

-protects land
-hits camel
-kills father
-is sentenced to hsi death for it
-boy wants to help his relative
-nobody cares
-somebody takes the courage
-the three days go by, man goes OH SHIIII…
-the boy returns
-brothers are like but but but but but!
-brothers forgive the boy

I don’t get it.
